channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenGnsys -- OpenGnsys
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenGnsys -- OpenGnsys

item.title: CVE-2024-3704|2024-04-12T13:47:03.946Z -- opengnsys -- opengnsys
item.description: SQL Injection Vulnerability has been found on OpenGnsys product affecting version 1.1.1d (Espeto). This vulnerability allows an attacker to inject malicious SQL code into login page to bypass it or even retrieve all the information stored in the database.
